MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Leicester Road,  Worcester Road, Aintree Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:39PM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7:00PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:08PM on 9th February 2021.
